====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[look]], to [[see]], to [[watch]]
#: {{zh-x|看 電影|to '''watch''' a movie}}
# {{lb|zh|transitive}} to [[read]]
#: {{zh-x|看 報紙|to '''read''' the newspaper}}
# to [[visit]], to [[call on]]
#: {{zh-x|我們 有時 去 看 我們 的 祖母。|We sometimes '''visit''' our grandmother.}}
# to [[think]], to [[feel]] (that)
#: {{zh-x|我 看 你 最好 就 出發。|I '''think''' you'd better get going.}}
# to [[consider]], to [[regard]] as, to [[treat]] like
#: {{zh-x|他們 把 他 看 得{de} 一 文 不 值。|They '''treat''' him like dirt.}}
# to [[depend]] on
#: {{zh-x|要 看|it '''depends''' on...}}
# to [[treat]] (a [[patient]] or [[sickness]])
